mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: First-ever domain registrar starting in 1991, operated .com, .net, and .org registries until 1999. Had 6.3 million registered domains by late 2010, down from monopoly position. Offered domain registration and web hosting.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: One of the first established ICANN-accredited domain registrars with long-standing industry presence. Offered all-in-one solution for domain services, web hosting, and website building.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Established ICANN-accredited domain registrar with all-in-one solution for domains, hosting, and website building. Reliable option for businesses seeking room to grow.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: One of first ICANN-accredited domain registrars. Reliable all-in-one solution for domains, hosting, website building, and online marketing. Appeals to businesses seeking established, reliable registrar.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Domain registrar and web hosting provider with over 25 years expertise. Offers domain search, transfer, forwarding, premium domains, and private registration. All-in-one platform for domain management, hosting, website building, and online marketing.

2010.note: First-ever domain registrar starting in 1991, operated .com, .net, and .org registries until 1999. Had 6.3 million registered domains by late 2010, down from monopoly position. Offered domain registration and web hosting.

2015.note: One of the first established ICANN-accredited domain registrars with long-standing industry presence. Offered all-in-one solution for domain services, web hosting, and website building.

2020.note: Established ICANN-accredited domain registrar with all-in-one solution for domains, hosting, and website building. Reliable option for businesses seeking room to grow.

2024.note: One of first ICANN-accredited domain registrars. Reliable all-in-one solution for domains, hosting, website building, and online marketing. Appeals to businesses seeking established, reliable registrar.

2025.note: Domain registrar and web hosting provider with over 25 years expertise. Offers domain search, transfer, forwarding, premium domains, and private registration. All-in-one platform for domain management, hosting, website building, and online marketing.
